runs.comm: good length, stays a touch low and Kieswetter defends in front of off
length, seaming away a touch outside the line of off, left alone
on the stumps, gets forward and tucks a couple into the gap at midwicket
touch of away swing in the channel outside off, Kieswetter pushes gently into the covers
length ball on middle, blocked to mid-on
good length outside off, leans out and pushes to cover-point - that, believe it or not, is England's best batting return from the opening over in the tournament so far
pitched up on middle and leg, Hales closes the face and works the ball through midwicket
stays back and steers a slightly back-of-a-length ball through backward point, not much wrong with the delivery but silky timing from Hales and it flies to the boundary
dug in and Hales swings lustily across the line, doesn't connect properly but the ball loops in front of deep midwicket and bounces safe
bumper, at the man, who ducks underneath
short ball but this doesn't really get up and Hales swings the ball nonchalantly away to long leg
four more, overpitched outside off by Southee and the batsman leans into a chunky square drive that almost goes all the way, dipping just before the rope at deep backward point
good length, angling in towards the stumps, pushed back to mid-on
gets forward in defence and manages to trap the ball between thigh and knee roll
length ball on the stumps, Kieswetter edges out to narrow the gap and turn the ball into a half-volley but his clip goes straight to midwicket
fullish length outside off, blocked into the ground back to the bowler
on the stumps and worked past midwicket, Taylor dives and gets a hand on it but can't stop one
slower ball and pushed on the front foot to cover - Mills, by contrast, and started like Mr Monopoly, bang on the money
round the wicket, tossed up on middle and worked to leg with a closed face
tossed up outside off stump, chopped to point on the back foot
length ball, straightening on middle and leg, worked through midwicket
full, almost a yorker from Vettori, and Kieswetter jams down on it
tossed up and bowled him! Kieswetter flailed across the line but the delivery was too full to sweep, it dipped under the swinging blade and spread the stumps like a sunburst
floated up on leg stump, Wright plays across the line and is hit on the pad but it was sliding down
good length on off stump, Wright shows it the full face in defence
in the corridor, maintains that nagging length, pushed to cover on the front foot
off the mark, Mills loses his line and Wright skims the ball round the corner for a gimme four to fine leg
full of a length outside off, tapped short and they steal one
slower ball, Hales throws the lot at it, slicing the ball high over point but Nathan McCullum does tremendously to reel it in before the rope
wide and a touch short but Wright wasn't expecting that and swings unsuccessfully
tossed up and punched back, Vettori fields off his own bowling
sliding in with the arm off a good length, backs away and cuts to point
pushed through, bit of loop outside off, pushed back and Vettori dives to his left to stop the ball
overpitched this time, drifting towards leg stump and Wright clips neatly through midwicket for four
advances and misses, hit on the pad but well outside the line
full and around the line of off, clipped firmly to mid-on, who has to move to his right to field well
looped up on off stump, punched back to the bowler
drags this short and slides down the leg side - wide

bowled him - he's now the leading wicket-taker again! This was flat, pushed through and gripping just a touch off the pitch, Hales left a gap as he advanced and swiped across the line and looked round to see leg stump rocking in the wind
round the wicket, flighted outside off, opens the face and pushes through cover
tossed up and clipped down the ground to long-on
pushed through on the stumps, flicked into the midwicket region
spinning in from outside off, Wright shuffles across and tickles the ball round the corner
floated up on off, turned through the leg side
round the wicket, tossed up outside off and Morgan watches it through
slides this through with the arm, too close to the stumps for the cut and Morgan almost gets himself in a tangle
gets forward this time and dabs to cover
tossed up, full and on the stumps, Wright pushes back past Nicol, despite him getting a hand on it
skips out and drives a full-length ball through the covers
round the wicket, pushed through, cut for one in front of point
flat and short, Wright bunts the ball down the ground to long-on
tossed up and pushed back to McCullum
flighted around the line of off, worked through midwicket
length ball, spinning towards leg stump, Wright is unable to work one off his pad
full toss from McCullum but Wright hits it flat to the man at deep midwicket for just the one
full and straight, gets forward and driven nicely down the ground, long-on gets round to prevent four
leaves the crease again, Nicol tries to spear it wide past the batsman but Wright leans out and thumps it flat through extra-cover for four
tossed up and driven down the ground for one
stays back and tries to cut but is beaten again
flighted outside off, pushed to long-off
turned through midwicket for a couple
fired in towards leg stump, takes the pad to the off side
comes down the pitch and bunts a full toss down the ground
worked from off stump into the leg side, midwicket is in swiftly but can't stop the single
shapes to play an expansive leg-side shot, ends up getting it off a toe-end towards midwicket
that looked like a bit of a top edge, but it was well struck actually and flew comfortably over the boundary...picked up from outside off stump
quick ball on the stumps, pushed into the off side
starts with a short ball and he's a touch fortunate as Wright's pull goes straight to deep square
beats the edge as he tries to open the face...McCullum doesn't take it cleanly
low full toss and Morgan fetches it from outside off, gets underneath the ball and uses his immense strength to just flick it over the long-on boundary
opens the face into the off side
short on leg stump, takes the pad into the leg side
latches onto a hint of width and cuts it fiercely past a diving backward point...wasn't a million miles from the fielder, but that was travelling
short of a length, Wright deep in the crease and works through square leg
dragged down short outside off, Morgan doesn't quite get his timing right as he cuts through the off side
the batsman misses out, was on leg stump and he flicked it straight to short fine-leg
uses his feet but can't get to the pitch and ends up having to push it back to the bowler
that would have been a wide if he'd missed, but Morgan went for the cut and got a bottom edge
brings out the reverse sweep but doesn't make clean contact...somehow that over only cost three, brings it back for New Zealand
worked through midwicket and Wright wanted the second before being sent back and needed to dive
round the wicket, full at off stump, driven down to long on
gets a little lucky here and he comes down the pitch then gets an inside edge past the keeper to short fine-leg
steps away to leg, was a touch shorter from Vettori and Morgan cuts firmly in front of square to give the point sweeper a decent chase
flicked from middle and off through straight midwicket with a strong bottom hand, placed wide of long on
moves outside leg again, opens up his stumps and slaps this in front of square to the cover sweeper...England played that over sensibly
full outside off, driven firmly through the off side and place wide of the deep cover sweeper so it allows a comfortable second
that's massive...Southee misses his yorker, offers up a length delivery and Wright launches it straight down the ground. For a while it doesn't look as though it will come down
changes to round the wicket, full outside leg stump and it's flick to deep square
length ball cut firmly to point and Morgan sends Wright back...he'd come half way
comes down the pitch to a ball outside leg stump, makes it into a low full toss and drives to deep cover
that's huge again, superb way to reach a half century...Southee again can't get the ball full enough and allows Wright to get underneath it with a monstrous pick up over deep midwicket
full outside off, swung along the ground to long on
tossed up slower by Nicol, Wright picks out square leg as he sweeps
fired down the leg side...extra ball for England
clears the deep midwicket boundary again, got down on one knee and struck this flatter than his previous blow
does it again, comes down the pitch outside off, nowhere near the pitch but just has the confidence now to swing through the line and clear long on
worked calmly along the ground to deep square...smart batting
full and flat, Morgan connects quite cleanly but sends it straight into the non-striker's stumps
short outside off, Wright hammers it square to deep cover
wonderful catch! Morgan picked this up from off stump and connected well, but Bracewell made a lot of ground to his left at long-on and hurled himself under the catch
loose from Mills, fired well wide outside off
a slower ball, full on middle, flicked into the leg side in front of square
short outside off, Buttler gets over the top of the ball and cuts down to third man
he's crunched that, a full ball outside off and Wright frees his arms with a powerful although deep cover almost pulled off a wonderful saving diving by the boundary...got his fingertips to it
Mills loses his concentration, drops it short outside off and Wright pulls it from a wide line through midwicket, goes one bounce wide of long-on
pushed back to the bowler
fired in at the pads, Buttler misses his flick and it trickles to short fine-leg
comes down the pitch, the arm ball spears towards the pads and runs into the off side
quicker ball cramps him for room as he punches off the back foot to cover
comes down the pitch and drives to cover
full on leg stump, opens the face and drives to the sweeper
starts with a length ball that is driven over cover as Buttler stands outside leg stump
he's struck second ball, Wright slaps this straight to cover as he tried to give himself a touch of room to go through the off side
short ball, Bairstow quickly onto it and pulls to fine leg...stood up nicely on a easy-paced surface
now that's very wide outside off
outside off, chopped to backward point who parries it away for a single and the scores are level
England win...a full delivery is forced down to mid-off and they scamper the single
